title: Shadowed Intentions
description: Kidnapped by the Inquisition, primary school teacher and werewolf, Regina Klau, is sure she’s about to meet her maker. Supes who are dragged into the science labs don’t see many more sunrises, and it won’t be long before it’s her turn.When vampire Kable is called in to investigate, things get personal. It’s his Bride who’s been taken. Leaving Reggie six years ago was the hardest thing he’d ever done, but the woman was born to be a mother, and he could never give her that. Now she’s in danger, and it’s up to Kable to find her—before she turns up as another of the endless stream of bodies he’s been investigating for the past year.A tormented werewolf.A protective vampire.Too many secrets.Love scenes with BITE.You’ve been warned—now let's have some fun!
author: S.E. Welsh
